review: Wonderful doctor...very cordial, and listened very attentively and explained everything to us. The treatment was meticulous and his vast experience showed. Would strongly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Foot Pain,Bone Fracture,Lower Back Pain,Joint Pain,Knee Pain,
review: My family is happy from ortho related treatments for the last 3 yrs under him.He is a very good person.** ******* * ******** ******** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ******* ** *** ***** ** ************ He is like our family doctor. For each and every cases of Orthopaedic related issues( Bone Fracture, Knee pain, Neck pain,Arthiritis and others ) ,we are taking his consultation only.As per my understading  he is giving very less medication and instead of that prescribing proper surgical instrument for most of the cases which is very fruitful.Also number of visits is also less.As for e.g . for mother's case(age 60),  she is totally free from knee pain since 2019 after taking just one injection. My in laws surgery was done with 100% success rate with very minimum cost.My mother is now totally happy with all of her ortho related ailments ( arthritis, Tennis elbow, Fore finger pain etc ) after following his guidelines.Compare to some other doctor, He has different identity , according to me.I am recommending him to everybody for all ortho related ailments.

The doctor was very nice *** *************. His attitude was very polite and he understood me issue and had given appropriate solution. I would recommend him to everyone. However, the receptionist's behaviour at the Health Check clinic is very rude. She should learn how to speak to people.

The doctor explained with the causes and effects of my health condition. He also discussed  the kind of medication I would  require. He was very patient and I felt comfortable discussing  my problems with him. In fact, he even called back (as the video call suddenly ended) since he thought that our conversation was cut short. It was my first-ever experience with online consultation and a good one.
Doctor is very friendly . Explained the reason behind my knee pain so well that I would recommend anyone to visit the doctor regarding any boin and joint issues.

review: Consulted Dr Sircar by video call for my father in laws bone fracture. ********* *** ********* The conservative  treatment plan worked out really well, he recovered without surgery. Best part is his empathy, patience. This is rare these days.
